title: Versace On The Floor
lyrics:
[intro] (C)
(C) Let's take our (Em)time tonight, (F)girl
Above us (F)all the stars are (G)watchin'
(C) There's no place I'd (Em)rather be in this (F)world
Your (F)eyes are where I'm (F)lost (G)in
(Gm) Underneath the (A)chandelier
We're (F)dancin' all a-(Fm)lone
There's no (Dm)reason to hide
What we're (Am)feelin' inside
Right (G)now
 
So baby let's just (F)turn down the lights
And (G)close the door
Oooh (F) I love that dress
But you won't (Gm)need it (C)anymore (F)
No you won't (Em)need it no more
Let's just (Dm)kiss 'til we're (Em)naked, (F)baby
 
[chorus]
Ver(G)sace on the (C)floor
Oo(Em)oh take it off for (F)me,
For me, for me, for me now, (G)girl
Versace on the (C)floor
Oo(Em)oh take it off for (F)me,
For me, for me, for me now, (G)girl
 
(C) I unzip the (Em)back to watch it (F)fall
While I (F)kiss your neck and (G)shoulders
(C) No don't be a-(Em)fraid to show it (F)off
I'll be right (F)here ready to (F)hold (G)you
(Gm) Girl you know you're (A)perfect from
Your (F)head down to your (Fm)heels
Don't be (Dm)confused by my smile
'Cause I ain't (Am)never been more
For (G)real, for real
 
So baby let's just (F)turn down the lights
And (G)close the door
Oooh (F) I love that dress
But you won't (Gm)need it (C)anymore (F)
No you won't (Em)need it no more
Let's just (Dm)kiss 'til we're (Em)naked, (F)baby
 
[chorus]
Ver(G)sace on the (C)floor
Oo(Em)oh take it off for (F)me,
For me, for me, for me now, (G)girl
Versace on the (C)floor
Oo(Em)oh take it off for (F)me,
For me, for me, for me now, (G)girl
Dance
 
[kazoo solo]
(F) (G) (Am) (G) (C)
(Dm) (G) (Gm) (F)
 
[chorus]
Ver(G)sace on the (C)floor
Oo(Em)oh take it off for (F)me,
For me, for me, for me now, (G)girl
Versace on the (C)floor
Oo(Em)oh take it off for (F)me,
For me, for me, for me now, (G)girl
 
[outro]
Ver(G)sace on the (A)floor
(B)Floor, (D)floor [end]
